blogPost.excerpt: Preparing for sales meetings is hard and tiresome. 1Page helps you search less, and sell more, by delivering customized one-page summary for every meeting and call, minutes before every meeting!
blogPost.body: Preparing for sales meetings is hard and tiresome. 1Page helps you search less, and sell more, by delivering customized one-page summary for every meeting and call, minutes before every meeting!
blogPost.title: 1Page - 1 Page summary to help you to join every meeting confidently
blogPost.author: Pooran Prasad Rajanna

localize.description: 为销售会议做准备是很辛苦的，也是很累人的。1Page通过在每次会议前几分钟，为每次会议和电话提供定制的单页摘要，帮助您减少搜索，增加销售量。
localize.tagline: 1页总结，助你自信加入每一次会议

localize.description: 爲銷售會議做準備是很辛苦的，也是很累人的。1Page通過在每次會議前幾分鐘，爲每次會議和電話提供定製的單頁摘要，幫助您減少搜索，增加銷售量。
localize.tagline: 1頁總結，助你自信加入每一次會議

previous.excerpt: People around the world recorded the sounds of their forests, so you can escape into nature, while in lockdown or unable to travel. Use this site to chill, meditate or do some digital shinrin-yoku.
previous.title: Tree.fm 🌲 - Tune into forests from around the world

localize.description: 世界各地的人们记录了他们的森林之声，所以你可以在被封锁或无法旅行的情况下，逃进大自然。在这个网站上，你可以放松心情，冥想或做一些数字神林屋。
localize.tagline: 聆听来自世界各地的森林之声

localize.description: 世界各地的人們記錄了他們的森林之聲，所以你可以在被封鎖或無法旅行的情況下，逃進大自然。在這個網站上，你可以放鬆心情，冥想或做一些數字神林屋。
localize.tagline: 聆聽來自世界各地的森林之聲

next.excerpt: Browse beautiful color schemes, optimized for backgrounds, borders, and more. Search for your perfect swatch for your project/design. Or, simply use our scheme generator! 🚀
next.title: Colortopia - The easiest way to find colours

localize.description: 浏览美丽的配色方案，针对背景、边框等进行优化。为您的项目/设计搜索您的完美色板。或者，简单地使用我们的方案生成器 🚀
localize.tagline: 寻找颜色的最简单方法

localize.description: 瀏覽美麗的配色方案，針對背景、邊框等進行優化。爲您的項目/設計搜索您的完美色板。或者，簡單地使用我們的方案生成器 🚀
localize.tagline: 尋找顏色的最簡單方法
